name: ChurchPres
overview:
ChurchPres provides churches with an easy to use platform for getting a website and online presence up and running.

By creating an account at ChurchPres, churches and ministries can have a professional pre-designed website set up in minutes. ChurchPres removes all of the complicated details from setting up a website. With a ChurchPres account, users are only required to enter their content. Utilizing the user friendly WordPress dashboard, ChurchPres websites offer a quick easy way to create pages, upload media and manage a website. Because churches and ministries need specific website features, ChurchPres websites come with plugins for sermons, events and donations.

ChurchPres also provides users with email addresses, website hosting and cloud storage for documents and media.
